snippet.title: TOSTCHU - Official Gameplay Trailer (TOAST SHOP HORROR GAME)
snippet.description:
Experience atmospheric horror of 90's in a desolate roadside toast house in Central Anatolia, Turkey.

FEATURES
- Manage your family business in your fathers absence.
- Make delicious Turkish Toasts for your customers in designated time limit.
- Don't freak out under pressure.
- Survive.

RELEASE 28 OCTOBER 2024 @ STEAM SCREAMFEST

WISHLIST TOSTCHU: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2221500/Tostchu/

Trailer Music by Dimitri Simakis [ghoulskool]

https://soundcloud.com/ghoul-skool


STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2221500/Tostchu/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/Raven_Scape
